ad_context:
Each Modern is pleased to announce its return to Taipei Dangdai. The presentation is titled Skyline, centering on rare works by two important postwar Taiwanese artists—Chen Ting-Shih and Hilo Chen. The featured pieces, The First Croack of Thunder (1972) by Chen Ting-Shih and City 7 (1981) by Hilo Chen, anchor the booth. 

In The First Croack of Thunder, a celestial body breaks through the surrounding blocks like a life form emerging from a cocoon—an explosive image evoking the sound of a thunderclap in silence, symbolizing light piercing the darkness. 

Taipei Dangdai
9 - 11 May, 2025
Booth A01

Hilo Chen
Chen Ting-Shih
Ding HongDan
Lin YiHsuan
Ling Yung
Moriyama Daido

@taipeidangdai
